BIS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 05 Yong Professional Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 14:45 IST
 Bureau of Indian Standards
 5 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 70,000 to 70,000




FOLLOW

The Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Young Professionals Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, MBA candidates can apply for the BIS Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Tamil Nadu.

BIS Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Young Professional	05	B.E./B. Tech, MBA

BIS Recruitment 2025 Age limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

BIS Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Practical Assessment.
Written Test.
Technical Knowledge Assessment.
Interview.

BIS Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

BIS Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 70,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the BIS Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the BIS Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	13-08-2025
Closing date	05-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
